(CL 20th; concentration +27)

2/day-form of the dragon II (white dragon only)

feats: Combat Casting, Dodge, Empower Spell, Eschew Materials, Great Fortitude, Greater Spell Focus (evocation), Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Mobility, Nimble Moves, Quicken Spell, Spell Focus (evocation), Spell Penetration, Toughness, Weapon Finesse

sections.body:
Before Combat The dragon disciple casts stoneskin.

During Combat The dragon disciple casts shield and spell resistance on herself, then takes flight and rains down destructive spells augmented with Empower Spell.

Base Statistics Without stoneskin, the dragon disciple's statistics are

DR none.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: With the patience of elves and the majesty of dragons, ice maidens are masters of subtle machinations—and of the battlefield.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Dragon Disciple/Dragon Disciples/Ice Maiden/Koriel Dragonchild

sections.body: The descendant of a white dragon and an elf, Koriel was driven to prove herself by killing a draconic relation and eating his heart, claiming his territory and hoard.
Koriel maintains a vast expanse of mountains as her domain, and those who enter it must pay tribute or surrender their lives.
Koriel sees herself as more dragon than elf, and lives as if she were a full-blooded dragon, killing those who say otherwise.

sections.name: Koriel Dragonchild

special_qualities: blood of dragons, bloodline arcana (cold spells deal +1 damage per die), elven magic, weapon familiarity, wings
name: Ice Maiden
skills: Climb +6, Diplomacy +12, Fly +11, Heal +5, Intimidate +15, Knowledge (arcana) +11, Knowledge (geography, local, nature, nobility, planes) +8, Perception +20, Sense Motive +5, Spellcraft +11 (+13 to identify magic item properties), Stealth +13, Survival +5, Use Magic Device +15
combat_gear: wand of cure serious wounds (10 charges), wand of lightning bolt (10 charges)
